description: Wash your hands often. Use soap and water or handsanitizer
Keep a safe distance to others that coughs or sneeze
Use a face mask when you cant keep a safe distance
Dont touch your eyes, nose or mouth
Cover your nose and mouth with your arm or a handkerchief when you cough or sneez
Stay at home if you are feeling sick
Seek medical aid if you have fewer, cough and struggle to breath
Call in advance so that you can be quickly referred to the right clinic. It protects you and prevents the virus and other infections from spreading to others
